Description:
Threat actors performed dumping of SAM, SECURITY and SYSTEM registry hives using DelegateExecute key

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Reg Add Open Command
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%reg%' and command like '%add%' and command like '%hkcu\software\classes\ms-settings\shell\open\command%' and command like '%/ve %' and command like '%/d%') or (command like '%reg%' and command like '%add%' and command like '%hkcu\software\classes\ms-settings\shell\open\command%' and command like '%/v%' and command like '%delegateexecute%') or (command like '%reg%' and command like '%delete%' and command like '%hkcu\software\classes\ms-settings%'))
